title: Boards Level Requirement Bug
body: I can't seem to be able to post on the boards yet, as it states I need to be at least level 7+. However, I'm level 13. I understand I can't upvote until level 30, but I should be able to post comments! Is there something I'm missing?

replies.body: The only thing missing was a quick boards sync, which posting here made that happen! Looks like you're all synced up and level 13 here on the boards as well!
